(MÄ°Y) [[association football|football]] team in 1985-86 season. ==Pre-season== * 21.08.1985 - MÄ°Y-Tarsus Ä°dmanyurdu: 4-2. ==1985â86 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group C in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1985â86 Turkish Second Football League|1985â86]] season. League played in three groups two with 18 teams and one with 17. Bottom four teams in in each group relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]], whereas top teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] at the end of the season.[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/8586/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 31 August 2009. MÄ°Y finished 12th with 8 wins and 21 goals. The team finished season with 16 draws 11 of which was 0-0. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Group C in [[1985â86 Turkish Second Football League|1985â86]] season is shown in the following table.Standings and results from [http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/8586/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
